info.title: Luo (Kenya and Tanzania)
info.description: This is an fst-based speller for Luo (Kenya and Tanzania). It is based on the normative subset of the morphological analyser for Luo (Kenya and Tanzania). The source code can be found at: https://victorio.uit.no/langtech/trunk/langs/luo/ License: GPL3+.

acceptor.title: Giellatekno/Divvun/UiT dictionary Luo (Kenya and Tanzania)
acceptor.description: Giellatekno/Divvun/UiT dictionary for Luo (Kenya and Tanzania) compiled for HFST.

errmodel.title: Levenshtein edit distance transducer
errmodel.description: Correction model for keyboard misstrokes, at most 2 per word.
